mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM schedule_job_graph_trigger WHERE trigger_time = #{triggerTime} AND trigger_type = #{triggerType} and is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: delete from schedule_job_graph_trigger where TO_DAYS(trigger_time) = TO_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE)
mapper.select: SELECT jpt.min_job_id FROM schedule_job_graph_trigger jpt WHERE jpt.trigger_time >= #{triggerStartTime} AND jpt.trigger_time <= #{triggerEndTime} ORDER BY jpt.id ASC limit 1
